title: Make a champion ability feel horrible to use without gutting them

replies.body: {{champion:30}} Passive no longer prevents the use of (R) Requiem within final 3 seconds of effect duration, but if effect ends while Requiem is channeling it will simply cancel it.

{{champion:28}}: Your keyboard shocks you every time you press Q.

Is that how it works, did I do it right?
my pinky would be numb before the first clear, the rest i would consider shock therapy.  imokwiththis
{{champion:29}} change the name of his ult.
Taric abilities no longer reset auto attacks.
Increase Riven's cast times by .1 seconds

{{champion:41}} -- Parrrrley! (Q) Damage halved, mana cost increased, no longer refunds partial mana on kill... oh wait, you said without gutting them. Nevermind. ^^

{{champion:78}} -- Heroic Charge (?) (E) Range cut in half. And something about losing an AA reset on her passive because of LC$ brats who abused it, even though the FAR MORE SENSIBLE THING TO DO would have been to nerf her W passive. >.>

{{champion:98}} Ki barrier (W) is tied to his Q.

Oh, wait.
